title: Reset
subtitle:
When you welcome new people into your community, you find yourself explaining all of the UK’s weird and wonderful traditions. Bonfire night is maybe one of the weirdest!

Will your #CommunitySponsorship Group be watching fireworks tonight with the #refugees you’re supporting? pic.twitter.com/buFAWsH4EN

title: George Okoth-Obbo
subtitle: Am this week stocktaking with Govt, partners+ @Refugees colleagues the asylum and protection needs which endure for 1.4 M Afghan refugees after 40 years of hospitality in #Pakistan + the imperative for sustainable solutions from inclusion to sustainable voluntary repatriation.pic.twitter.com/UgAIHutth1

title: Sophia Maier
subtitle: Today I left #Samos refugee camp, I feel as sad and empty as I didn’t for a long time in my life. Thousand of children, families, vulnerable people are forced to live under inhumane conditions like animals. Why is Europe letting that happen? Why did we all burry our humanity? /1 pic.twitter.com/GlzCLdtz8o

title: Wiltshire for Refugees

Refugee Autumn Appeal

We'll be joining @TransCoCorsham on Saturday 9 November @corshamcampus collecting GLOVES, HATS, SCARVES & NEW SOCKS. Much need items for refugees in these colder months. Please spread the word if you can. Thank you kindly. #chooselovepic.twitter.com/25SW4ctT8H
